title: File a UCC Financing Statement
description: In a secured lending transaction, the lender's counsel needs to file a UCC-1 financing statement to perfect the lender's security interest in the collateral.

tasks.description: Gather the required information: debtor's legal name and address, secured party's name and address, and a description of the collateral.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all the necessary data for the filing.
Agent correctly fills out the form.

tasks.description: File the UCC-1 form with the appropriate Secretary of State's office.
tasks.expected_outcome: The financing statement is successfully filed, perfecting the security interest.
